name: Novablast
description:
Novablast is a action based racing game where you compete with other fearless inhabitants ofthe universe to gain fame, recognition, honor, money, more fame and more money. In the sheeract of competing all around the universe versus extraterrestrial gods and other species you gainpower and slowly become the dominator of every single space racetrack out there.

Up to ten players over the network or local and NPCs are competing on different racing tracksin space against each other. Every single player can choose between several different types ofvehicles like a spaceship, rockets or hoverboards with different equipment. The players get thesame amount of money at the beginning of a grand prix consisting of four racetracks. Dependingon their performance on each track the players get additional money which can be spend on newequipment or vehicle parts before each race to improve their chance to win.
